article.text: Defense sector-specific solutions are driving growth in the cybersecurity market and will continue to do so through 2016. According to a Research and Markets report, the escalating amount of data stored in defense information systems and the increased number of cyberthreats are a major driver of this trend. As a result, companies are focusing on developing security products dedicated specifically to the defense sector. The Global Defense Cyber Security Market 2012-2016 report includes a description of the market and vendor landscape as well as a strengths, weaknesses, opportunities and threats analysis of key vendors. Among the corporations concentrating on creating the solutions for this sector, study participants identified BAE Systems, General Dynamics, Lockheed Martin, Raytheon, Boeing, Booz Allen Hamilton, CSC, Kaspersky Lab and Northrop Grumman.
